evs.metric.metrics
Class SpreadBiasDiagram

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.metrics.Metric
      evs.metric.metrics.DiagramMetric
          evs.metric.metrics.SpreadBiasDiagram
All Implemented Interfaces:
BootstrapableMetric, EnsembleMetric, ThresholdMetric, java.lang.Comparable
public class SpreadBiasDiagram
extends DiagramMetric
implements EnsembleMetric, ThresholdMetric, BootstrapableMetric

The spread-bias plot shows the fraction of observations falling in a given probability interval on the forecast support, which should be equal to the width of that interval (in the case of perfect reliability).

Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Constructor Detail

SpreadBiasDiagram

public SpreadBiasDiagram(SpreadBiasPointsParameter pointCount,
                         ForecastTypeParameter fType,
                         UnconditionalParameter unconditional,
                         CentralSpreadBiasParameter cent,
                         MinimumSampleSizeParameter minS,
                         BootstrapParameter bs)
Attempts to construct a spread-bias diagram with associated parameters.

Parameters:
pointCount - the number of points to include in the diagram
fType - the forecast types
unconditional - is true to always use unconditional pairs, false to use conditional pairs when available
cent - is true to center the windows around the ensemble median value (i.e. symmetric windows)
minS - the minimum sample size
bs - the bootstrap parameter

SpreadBiasDiagram

public SpreadBiasDiagram(DoubleProcedureParameter threshold,
                         SpreadBiasPointsParameter pointCount,
                         ForecastTypeParameter fType,
                         UnconditionalParameter unconditional,
                         CentralSpreadBiasParameter cent,
                         MinimumSampleSizeParameter minS,
                         BootstrapParameter bs)
Attempts to construct a spread-bias diagram with associated parameters.

Parameters:
threshold - the threshold condition
pointCount - the number of points to include in the diagram
fType - the forecast types
unconditional - is true to always use unconditional pairs, false to use conditional pairs when available
cent - is true to center the windows around the ensemble median value (i.e. symmetric windows)
bs - the bootstrap parameter

compute

public MetricResult[] compute(int forecastType,
                              PairedData paired,
                              MetricResult refResult)
                       throws MetricCalculationException
Uses the specified paired data to compute and return the result of the metric. The metric results are returned, together with the sample counts, but not stored locally. The metric result is located in the first index of the return array and the sample counts are located in the second index. Optionally, specify the results of a reference forecast from which to compute skill if the metric is a skill score.

Specified by:
compute in class Metric
Parameters:
forecastType - the forecast type
paired - the paired data
refResult - the results for a reference forecast (may be null)
Returns:
the metric result and sample counts
Throws:
MetricCalculationException

clearBootstrapPar

Specified by:
clearBootstrapPar in interface BootstrapableMetric

getSpreadBias

public MetricResult getSpreadBias(DoubleMatrix2D data,
                                  double nV)
Returns the a spread-bias diagram dataset from an input dataset with the windows in the second row and the reliability in the first row. The input should comprise one column of observations (at index 0) and the remaining n columns should comprise the n ensemble members (index 1 through n).

Parameters:
data - the input data
nV - the null value
Returns:
a spread-bias diagram
